in.robotix.xantsclient
Class XweenClient

java.lang.Object
  in.robotix.xantsclient.XweenClient

public class XweenClient
extends java.lang.Object

The user needs to 'fill-in' this class to provide the desired functionality. There is only one instance of this class on the client side and that instance acts the intelligence of the Xween. The instantiation is done and the functions are called automatically.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CLIENT_SIGNATURE
          Modify this constant and set it to any string you wish to tag your Xween with.
static int NUMBER_OF_XANTS
          Modify this constant and set it to the number of Xants to be spawned in the beginning of the simulation.

Constant Field Values

CLIENT_SIGNATURE

public static final java.lang.String CLIENT_SIGNATURE
Modify this constant and set it to any string you wish to tag your Xween with. It's value has little more than cosmetic importance.

Method Detail

nextCycle

public void nextCycle(XweenActionProxy proxy)
Called once every execution cycle.

Parameters:
proxy - An instance of XweenActionProxy. The code inside inside the method is supposed to call the various methods through this instance to execute corresponding actions.
